position_lamp_head.description: Position the lamp head according to the lighting needs.

clean_head_surface.description: Clean the surface of the lamp head to ensure maximum lighting efficiency.

readjust_lamp_head.description: Readjust the position of the lamp head to its original position.

adjust_lamp_head.description: Adjust the head of the lamp to change the light direction

clean_lamp_head.description: Clean the head of the Lamp to remove dust or any particles

rotateLampHead.description: Rotate the head of the lamp to adjust the light direction.

rotate_lamp_head.description: Rotate the lamp head to adjust the light direction.

cleanup_lamp_base.description: Clean up the lamp base to maintain the lamp's aesthetic appeal.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the base of the lamp to remove dust or any particles

cleanLampBase.description: Clean the base of the lamp to remove dust or any other particles.

total_lamp_cleanup.description: Perform a total clean up of the lamp which involves cleaning the lamp base and head.

lamp_position_adjustment.description: Perform an overall lamp position adjustment. This involves adjusting the lamp head thrice to get it to the right position.

full_lamp_maintenance.description: Perform full maintenance of the lamp. This involves cleaning the entire lamp and readjusting the lamp head.

overall_lamp_maintenance.description: Perform overall maintenance, adjust the head and clean the lamp

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the whole Lamp, including the head and base

cleanWholeLamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the head and base.

rotate_and_clean_head.description: Rotate the lamp head and clean it.
